Subject: Your Rewards Points are About to Expire!

---

Dear Valued Customer,

I hope this message finds you well and sipping on something delightful!

I'm reaching out today with an important note about your Delphi's Delights Rewards. You currently have 3,500 rewards points, and I wanted to remind you that these points are set to expire in just 3 days.

We wouldn’t want you to miss out on the chance to treat yourself! With those points, you can indulge in some of our exquisite offerings. Imagine enjoying a soothing Persephone’s Pomegranate Tea, warming up with Dionysus' Divine Cocoa, or perhaps starting your morning with the bold yet smooth Hades' Dark Roast Coffee.

To make the most out of your rewards, simply click on your [Rewards Portal] to redeem your points and enjoy these delightful beverages.

As the Loyalty Program Manager for Delphi's Delights, I'm here to ensure that each of your visits is as rewarding as can be. Please take a moment to explore your options before your points expire.

Thank you for being such a cherished member of our community. We can't wait to continue to serve you your favorites!

Warm regards,

Robert Simmons  
Loyalty Program Manager  
Delphi’s Delights  

---

P.S. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or need assistance navigating your rewards. We're always here to help!
